  • Method Details

    • continueWithOrderOutOfMenu

      private void continueWithOrderOutOfMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException

      Throws:
      IOException

    • restartMenuUI

      public void restartMenuUI() throws FileNotFoundException
      This method restarts the pizzas menu UI to re-render the components
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - in case pizza image source is not founded

      private void managePizzaOrderQuantity(Order currentOrder, int quantityToAdd)

      Parameters:
      currentOrder - the current pizza order made by the user

      Parameters:
      predefinedPizza - the pizza ordered by the user
      pizzaSize - the pizza size ordered
      Returns:
      the new Order Object

    • createPizzaMenuPane

      private javafx.scene.layout.Pane createPizzaMenuPane(PredefinedPizza predefinedPizza) throws FileNotFoundException
      Creates a Pane that will be a container to display each pizza in the menu information and order buttons It calls to the others method for interacting in the view to add in the pane
      Parameters:
      predefinedPizza - the current pizza the Pane is for
      Returns:
      the Pane created
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - in case the pizza image source is not founded

      • JavaFXComponents

    • addPizzaPaneToMenuGrid

      private void addPizzaPaneToMenuGrid(int indexList, javafx.scene.layout.Pane pizzaPane, int listSize)
      This method adds a pizza pane to the grid to display all of them in a kind of table in the screen
      Parameters:
      indexList - the index of the current pizza pane in the ArrayList obtained from DataBase
      pizzaPane - the current pizza pane to insert in the grid
      listSize - the size of predefined pizzas options in the menu

    • updateDBOrders

      public void updateDBOrders(DBOrders dbOrders) throws FileNotFoundException
      This method will be used to update the database orders to the one received from the HomeOrder with all the orders from the different screens
      Parameters:
      dbOrders - the dbOrders with the data orders updated
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

    • setQuantityOrderValues

      private void setQuantityOrderValues(PredefinedPizza predefinedPizza)
      This method adds quantity pizza orders data to the Hashmap quantityOrders
      Parameters:
      predefinedPizza - the current pizza to add its sizes data

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws FileNotFoundException
      This method will be called when the view is rendered. It calls the different above methods to show all the required menu information
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - in case some pizza image sources is not founded
